Welcome to Schnebly Redland's Winery and Brewery
- A Family-Owned Journey of Excellence
A place where the art of winemaking transcends tradition. Situated within the embrace of a tranquil tropical country setting, our winery, a family-owned and operated enterprise, proudly holds the distinction of being the southernmost winery in the continental U.S. What sets us apart? The visionary journey of our founders, Denisse and Peter Schnebly, who dared to transform winemaking by harnessing the essence of tropical fruits. This audacious approach has not only redefined winemaking but has created an unparalleled experience for every guest who walks through our doors.
Our Story
Our story began in 2004 and has since unfolded as a haven for wine connoisseurs seeking an experience that resonates beyond the ordinary. Across an expanse of 30 acres, our grounds thrive with a diverse array of mango, carambola, passion fruit, and lychee groves. These extraordinary fruits are the heartbeats of our diverse and captivating wine collection. Each bottle is a testament to our unwavering dedication to craftsmanship and innovation, a testament that continues to unfold with every sip.
Steeped in dedication and inspired by nature‚Äôs elegance, our mission is to transport you to a realm of unforgettable sensations. As you sip our tropical fruit wines, surrounded by the gentle murmur of cascading waterfalls and the whimsical charm of tiki huts, we strive to create an escape that lingers in your memory. Our vision is a tapestry woven with the threads of passion, flavor, and relaxation‚Äîan oasis where each visit becomes a cherished memory, and every wine embodies the essence of our journey.
305-242-1224 Ext. 117
30205 SW 217th Ave
Homestead Florida 33030
info@schneblywinery.com

21:23 27 Nov 24
Amazing new wines!
James Graham
17:30 26 Nov 24
Christian was very friendly and took his time explaining each wine.
Michael Lordi
20:52 25 Nov 24
Iriana Quiles Zuhei Coach
01:57 25 Nov 24
Spend my birthday celebration here
The Apretivo was Pork Belly in Cilantro sauce and Dinner was Lamb with Potatoes and Tostones.
Also Take Sangria Carbenet
Taste several Wines and buy some Bottles to Take At the Wine Bar, our Bartebder Jessy, a super attentive and friendly boy, I loved everything he explained to us about each of the Wines
shae benjamin
23:23 17 Nov 24
The ambiance was amazing! Our waiter Ernesto was very informative and attentive.
There's so much to see and learn about Schnebly Redland's Winery please make time to visit! Take a look at my meal which was super delish!!! I must say compliments to the chef!!! Thank you Schnebly!
Alejandra Rivera
18:56 06 Nov 24
Visited with some friends and loved the environment. The day was clear and windy making it a great experience. We shared a bottle of the Category 3 Hurricane and it was  really good. We did not have time to try the brewery but I think it's a great excuse to go back. There are multiple wine options including wine tasting. It's a great place to spend an evening with friends or family. Totally recommend and I'm hoping to go back soon.
Rene Figueroa
20:26 26 Oct 24
This is a place that you must visit when you‚Äôre in the Homestead area! Place is beautifully decorated and well thought out. They have a a lovely outdoor area where kids can run around and play while adults admire the exotic fish in the pond.
The food and service are top notch! I had never tried any tropical fruit wine before until I came to this place! Mia, our server, is extremely knowledgeable in the menu and offered us some suggestions! I had the burger and the meat was cooked to the temperature I requested and presentation was nice! We also had the tuna salad, which was very refreshing!
Tip: They also serve coffee! We had an expresso, latte and mocha!
felipe
18:39 12 Oct 24
If you‚Äôre looking for a great experience at Schnebly Redlands Winery, ask for Layla as your waitress. Layla is attentive, friendly, and has excellent knowledge of the menu, both in terms of food and wine. She goes out of her way to ensure that your dining experience is comfortable and enjoyable. Whether you‚Äôre a regular or visiting for the first time, she makes sure you‚Äôre well taken care of. Layla is quick to recommend the perfect wine pairings and provides prompt service without being overbearing. Her welcoming attitude adds a personal touch to the overall ambiance of Schnebly‚Äôs. Highly recommended!

Events Calendar
Schnebly's Oasis
Exclusive Venue - The Oasis is an exclusive private event venue, perfect for any outdoor wedding ceremony and reception
Pool and Tiki Bar - Take a break from the festivities and relax by our pool and tiki bar.
Airbnb - Why not make your staycation an event? Rent the Oasis for your next private event.
Beautiful outdoor spaces perfect for ceremonies or receptions!
Fully furnished event space with all the amenities you need!
Schnebly's Oasis
Exclusive Venue - The Oasis is an exclusive private event venue, perfect for any outdoor wedding ceremony and reception
Pool and Tiki Bar - Take a break from the festivities and relax by our pool and tiki bar.
Airbnb - Why not make your staycation an event? Rent the Oasis for your next private event.
Beautiful outdoor spaces perfect for ceremonies or receptions!
Fully furnished event space with all the amenities you need!
Schnebly's Oasis
4.1 Miles from Schnebly Winery Nestled in 10 acres of gorgeous fruit trees lies Schnebly Oasis. This stunning private estate features a 2-acre lake surrounded by immaculate landscape, 2 guest homes that are also available as accommodations,¬†and serene views from every corner.
All events at this luxurious private estate include valet and this venue is completely private to your special event.
Our passion is making lasting memories for each and every one of our clients, we have created the perfect place for just that, let us take your stress away step by step and make your wedding dreams come true!
Photos

30205 SW 217th Ave
Homestead Florida 33030

üç∑ Labor Day at Schnebly Winery üç∑
This Labor Day, escape to paradise at Schnebly Winery! üå¥‚ú® Enjoy our exotic tropical fruit wines while exploring the beauty of our waterfalls and tiki huts. Join one of our guided winery tours available from Noon to 5PM and discover the story behind the southernmost winery in the U.S.

üç∑ Labor Day at Schnebly Winery üç∑
This Labor Day, escape to paradise at Schnebly Winery! üå¥‚ú® Enjoy our exotic tropical fruit wines while exploring the beauty of our waterfalls and tiki huts. Join one of our guided winery tours available from Noon to 5PM and discover the story behind the southernmost winery in the U.S.

21:23 27 Nov 24
Amazing new wines!
James Graham
17:30 26 Nov 24
Christian was very friendly and took his time explaining each wine.
Michael Lordi
20:52 25 Nov 24
Iriana Quiles Zuhei Coach
01:57 25 Nov 24
Spend my birthday celebration here
The Apretivo was Pork Belly in Cilantro sauce and Dinner was Lamb with Potatoes and Tostones.
Also Take Sangria Carbenet
Taste several Wines and buy some Bottles to Take At the Wine Bar, our Bartebder Jessy, a super attentive and friendly boy, I loved everything he explained to us about each of the Wines
shae benjamin
23:23 17 Nov 24
The ambiance was amazing! Our waiter Ernesto was very informative and attentive.
There's so much to see and learn about Schnebly Redland's Winery please make time to visit! Take a look at my meal which was super delish!!! I must say compliments to the chef!!! Thank you Schnebly!
Alejandra Rivera
18:56 06 Nov 24
Visited with some friends and loved the environment. The day was clear and windy making it a great experience. We shared a bottle of the Category 3 Hurricane and it was  really good. We did not have time to try the brewery but I think it's a great excuse to go back. There are multiple wine options including wine tasting. It's a great place to spend an evening with friends or family. Totally recommend and I'm hoping to go back soon.
Rene Figueroa
20:26 26 Oct 24
This is a place that you must visit when you‚Äôre in the Homestead area! Place is beautifully decorated and well thought out. They have a a lovely outdoor area where kids can run around and play while adults admire the exotic fish in the pond.
The food and service are top notch! I had never tried any tropical fruit wine before until I came to this place! Mia, our server, is extremely knowledgeable in the menu and offered us some suggestions! I had the burger and the meat was cooked to the temperature I requested and presentation was nice! We also had the tuna salad, which was very refreshing!
Tip: They also serve coffee! We had an expresso, latte and mocha!
felipe
18:39 12 Oct 24
If you‚Äôre looking for a great experience at Schnebly Redlands Winery, ask for Layla as your waitress. Layla is attentive, friendly, and has excellent knowledge of the menu, both in terms of food and wine. She goes out of her way to ensure that your dining experience is comfortable and enjoyable. Whether you‚Äôre a regular or visiting for the first time, she makes sure you‚Äôre well taken care of. Layla is quick to recommend the perfect wine pairings and provides prompt service without being overbearing. Her welcoming attitude adds a personal touch to the overall ambiance of Schnebly‚Äôs. Highly recommended!
